reviews.review: Muito bom tanto em gráfico quanto em jogabilidade.

Honestly a solid game with massive amounts of playability. I keep coming back to this game because of it's unrivaled variability within matches. Overall good matchmaking and fun/funny community. A true valve gem. A forever classic.
